body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca McKinney Gritton in Mercer County, Kentucky, in April 1806. Father of Mecca "Mickey" Gritton and John J. Gritton. Married to Mary "Polly" Atkins Gritton in Mercer County in October 1855. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.
